name: tbw-ax1
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(wi(w1, w2), wi(w0, w2)))

body.origin: |- wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(wi(w1, w2), wi(w0, w2)))

cumulated.origin: |- wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(wi(w1, w2), wi(w0, w2)))

comment: The first of four axioms in the Tarski-Bernays-Wajsberg system. (Contributed by Anthony Hart, 13-Aug-2011.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
